mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TABLE(user_id, user_name, user_loginID, user_password, user_age, user_gender, user_address, user_grade, user_email) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_loginID}, #{user_password}, #{user_age}, #{user_gender}, #{user_address}, #{user_grade}, #{user_email})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER_TABLE WHERE user_loginID = #{loginId} AND user_password = #{password}
SELECT * FROM USER_TABLE WHERE user_name = #{name} AND user_email = #{email}
